decision_conditions: It is recommended that the trees shown on the Havering TPO plan 4/15 and identified as below for the works to be completed so as to facilitate the installation  and so as to not to overhang the balconies once installed.
T1 (T10 on plan) - Lime - Reduce crown with branches to the south cut back to 3m away from the building.
T2 (T12 on plan) - Oak - Reduce crown with branches to the south cut back to 3m away from the building.
T4 (T18 on plan) - Red Oak - Reduce crown with branches to the north cut back to 3m away from the building.
T5 (T23 on plan) - Blue Atlas Cedar - Reduce crown with branches to the north cut back to 3m away from the building.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
To prevent the accumulation of consents.

It is suggested that you engage the services of a qualified and fully insured tree surgeon to carry out the above work on your behalf (you should ask to see the contractor's insurance certificate and make sure that it is up to date).
description:
The works are required to the TPO trees to ensure that branches are cut back to ensure that they are not overhanging the balconies to the new apartment block.  The proposed works that we require consent for are listed below:-

T1 (T10 on plan) - Lime - Reduce crown with branches to the south cut back to 3m away from the building 
T2 (T12 on plan) - Oak - Reduce crown with branches to the south cut back to 3m away from the building 
T4 (T18 on plan) - Red Oak - Reduce crown with branches to the north cut back to 3m away from the building 
T5 (T23 on plan) - Blue Atlas Cedar - Reduce crown with branches to the north cut back to 3m away from the building
